TopicTitle: Some issues with the Mission Results Success window

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I managed to complete a mission this morning, Meet Me in Zero G, on the first try no less!  Unfortunately I was met with a mission success window that has some problems:

 

 

1.  Both Bronze and Silver Award text bleed up into the Trophies/Achievements blue bar.

2. Silver award's flavor text bleeds down bedhind the Summary blue bar.

3.  Inconsistent wording in the flavor text between "with the required bronze score" and "with the required silver score points".

4. Personal opinion: higher ranking awards should be listed before lower ranking ones, the example here being Bronze being displayed before Silver.

 

 

This is the only mission I have completed so far, but I'll keep my eye out for other UI problems in the results windows for other missions now.

 

Edited March 18, 2018 by klesh
